document.full_text: around 250 young afghans gathered at kabul university on tuesday shouting "death to america" on the fifth day of protests against the burning of a koran by a fundamentalist u.s. pastor.
document.title: students gather in kabul on fifth day of afghan protests
lines_and_colors: around 250 young afghans gathered at kabul university on tuesday shouting "death to america" on the fifth day of protests against the burning of a koran by a fundamentalist u.s. pastor.
